SECTION_CONTENT:
SECTION 13: Disposal considerations
13.1 Waste treatment methods
Product
Waste material must be disposed of in accordance with the national and local regulations.
Leave chemicals in original containers. No mixing with other waste. Handle uncleaned
containers like the product itself. Pressurised gas bottle: dispose of only in empty
condition! See www.retrologistik.com for processes regarding the return of chemicals and
containers, or contact us there if you have further questions.
